name: Mediterranean Pasta
description: Pasta bringing together all Mediterranean flavors with sun-dried tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and fresh basil.

instructions.instruction: Bring large pot of well-salted water to boil.
Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
instructions.tip: Al dente = slightly firm, ready to absorb sauce.

instructions.instruction: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic slices, saut√© until golden, about 1 minute.
instructions.tip: Don't let it burn - it turns bitter.

instructions.instruction: Add sun-dried tomatoes and red pepper flakes, stir 2 minutes.
Add cherry tomatoes, cook until slightly softened, 2-3 minutes.
Add half cup pasta water and toss to combine.
Remove from heat. Add half the parmesan and half the feta.
Add most basil leaves and squeeze lemon juice.
Add black pepper and toss one final time.
Top with remaining feta, parmesan, and fresh basil to serve.

tips: Always save some pasta water - it's perfect for bringing sauce together.
Use the oil from sun-dried tomatoes for extra flavor.
Add grilled chicken or shrimp for extra protein.
Whole wheat pasta makes it more nutritious.
storageInfo: Refrigerate up to 3 days. Add splash of olive oil or water when reheating.
servingSuggestion: Serve with crusty bread and white wine.
variations: With chicken: Add grilled chicken slices.
Vegan: Skip feta or use vegan cheese, omit parmesan.
